languages.text: {n}Кассия взволнованно прикладывает тонкие пальцы к губам и опускает взгляд.{/n} "Я... особенно рада вашему возвращению, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, у вас найдется минутка... когда вы покончите с делами..."

{n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия взволнованно прикладывает тонкие пальцы к губам и опускает взгляд.{/n} "Я... особенно рада вашему возвращению, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, у вас найдется минутка... когда вы покончите с делами..."

{n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅紧张地将纤细的手指放在嘴唇上，垂下了目光。{/n}“我……你能平安归来，我由衷地感到欢欣，舰长大人。我希望……等你履行完你的职责之后……能抽个空……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅紧张地将纤细的手指放在嘴唇上，垂下了目光。{/n}“我……你能平安归来，我由衷地感到欢欣，舰长大人。我希望……等你履行完你的职责之后……能抽个空……”

languages.text: {n}Cassia legt nervös die dünnen Finger an ihre Lippen und senkt den Blick.{/n} "Ich bin ... überaus froh über Eure Rückkehr, Lord Captain. Ich hoffe, Ihr findet einen Augenblick Zeit ... wenn Ihr Euch um Eure Pflichten gekümmert habt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia legt nervös die dünnen Finger an ihre Lippen und senkt den Blick.{/n} "Ich bin ... überaus froh über Eure Rückkehr, Lord Captain. Ich hoffe, Ihr findet einen Augenblick Zeit ... wenn Ihr Euch um Eure Pflichten gekümmert habt ..."

languages.text: {n}L'air nerveux, Cassia porte ses doigts fins à ses lèvres et baisse les yeux.{/n} « Votre... Votre retour me ravit au plus haut point, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'espère que vous pourrez trouver un moment à m'accorder... une fois que vous aurez accompli tous vos devoirs... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air nerveux, Cassia porte ses doigts fins à ses lèvres et baisse les yeux.{/n} « Votre... Votre retour me ravit au plus haut point, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'espère que vous pourrez trouver un moment à m'accorder... une fois que vous aurez accompli tous vos devoirs... »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, lleva sus esbeltos dedos a sus labios y baja la mirada.{/n} «Estoy... especialmente feliz por su regreso, Lord Capitán. Espero que pueda sacar un momento... después de ocuparse de sus deberes».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, lleva sus esbeltos dedos a sus labios y baja la mirada.{/n} «Estoy... especialmente feliz por su regreso, Lord Capitán. Espero que pueda sacar un momento... después de ocuparse de sus deberes».

languages.text: {n}カシアは緊張気味に細い指を唇にあて、目を伏せた。{/n}「私…ロード・キャプテンのお帰りを…本当にうれしく思っているんです。職務を全うされた後にでも…少しお時間をいただけたら嬉しいです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは緊張気味に細い指を唇にあて、目を伏せた。{/n}「私…ロード・キャプテンのお帰りを…本当にうれしく思っているんです。職務を全うされた後にでも…少しお時間をいただけたら嬉しいです」

languages.text: {n}Cassia, ince parmaklarını kaygıyla dudağına götürüp gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Dönüşün... Beni özellikle etkiledi Lord Kaptan. Belki vazifelerinle ilgilendikten sonra... Bana biraz vakit ayırabilirsin..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nervously brings her thin fingers to her lips and lowers her eyes.{/n} "I am... particularly gladdened by your return, Lord Captain. I hope that you can find a moment... once you have seen to your duties..."
